page.title: 11GAMES
page.content: Some of the games we play today are hockey,rounders,tennis,netball and badminton.To play hockey you need a curved stick and a ball,the idea of the game is that you hit the ball towards the goals. To play netball you need seven players on each side,and a ball.You cannot move while the ball is in your hands.To score a point,you have to throw the ball through the ring at the top of pole. To play rounders you need a bat and a ball and four poles which are called bases to play the game.When you hit the ball you must run around all the bases to a rounder.The fielders must try to catch you out. Tennis is played wereby two to four people continue to hit a ball,with a tennis racket,back and forward the net.
